title: Rename website and add daily labour service

requirements.text: Update the website name from 'Ajay Labour Service' to a new name specified by the user. Update all occurrences in frontend files including SEO metadata, page titles, headers, footers, and About page content.
acceptanceCriteria: All visible references to the website name are updated consistently across all pages
SEO metadata (title tags, meta descriptions) reflect the new name
Footer, header, and About page display the new name
No hardcoded references to the old name remain in user-facing content

requirements.text: Add 'Daily Labour Service' as a new service offering on the Services page. Include a dedicated section with service description, features, typical use cases, and worker qualifications similar to existing service categories (mason, electrician, plumber, painter, construction helper, daily wage labour).
acceptanceCriteria: A new 'Daily Labour Service' section appears on the Services page
The section includes a clear description of what daily labour services entail
Features and benefits are listed in a format consistent with other service categories
The service is visually integrated with the existing services layout

requirements.text: Ensure the 'Daily Labour Service' is accessible from the homepage services preview section and includes appropriate call-to-action buttons linking to the detailed service information.
acceptanceCriteria: Daily Labour Service appears in the homepage services preview grid
CTA buttons (Call Now, WhatsApp, Book Now) work correctly for the new service
The service card maintains visual consistency with existing service cards

constraints: Do not modify backend code (previous build attempts failed when changing backend)
Maintain existing color scheme and visual design unless new name requires branding updates
Preserve all existing functionality including WhatsApp integration and contact forms

Do not edit immutable frontend paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui
nonGoals: Changing the backend booking or payment logic
Altering the color scheme or visual theme
Adding new backend routes or API endpoints
